name: Tick Tock
description: How could the Federation function with so many lost? How could it recover? Liasion Sahil lends his expertise from the future towards finding a solution, while Tilly is on a mission to find Burnham, who never returned from her undercover mission into the Terran Empire.
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Supply Missions in one phase, and Faction Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Supply Missions and Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Sahil, Tilly, Mayweather, Courier Burnham, or Mirror Universe crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions and Faction Missions.
-- Every Supply or Faction Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 1 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Sahil, Tilly, Mayweather, Mirror Universe or Courier Burnham
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Saru
featured_crew.flavor: As a slave, the previously unnamed Kelpien attends to Captain Burnham.

featured_crew.name: Tilly
featured_crew.flavor: Seeking help in the repair of their communications equipment, Tilly accompanies Saru on an away mission.

adventures.name: Temporal Facilities
adventures.description: Designate facilities to treat the affected.

adventures.name: Off Limits
adventures.description: Secure sites known to be temporally unstable.

rewards.name: Tick Tock
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Tilly
rewards.flavor: Seeking help in the repair of their communications equipment, Tilly accompanies Saru on an away mission.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "I thought it would be such a pleasure to be in a time when the Federation was real, and strong... but your problems are new, even for someone nine hundred years older."

"Time travel was outlawed in my time, partly because of temporal degeneration. If we were to lose everyone here who isn't of this timeline, and everyone who's been spirited away never returns... the Federation wouldn't be able to function, to say nothing of the loss."

"You're of this moment, Captain. You're safe from temporal degeneration, so you'll have to be the one to find the solution. I can relay everything you learn about it and those affected to authorities, if you can get to them before the worst happens...."
